text:
Modernizing and migrating monolithic mainframe 
applications to scalable, cost-efficient cloud

environments is a multi-year endeavor requiring 
deep expertise in mainframe modernization and

cloud - resources that are hard to come by. 
Large-scale transformation efforts can be

complex, require cross-team collaboration, and often 
fail to deliver optimal modernization outcomes.

AWS Transform solves these challenges 
with agentic AI-powered automation

capabilities that allow modernization 
consultants, IT professionals, and mainframe

experts to automate and accelerate 
mainframe application modernization.

Multi-functional teams can collaborate and use 
AWS Transform's unified web experience tailored

for large-scale transformation to modernize 
and migrate monolithic COBOL applications to

cloud-optimized Java applications. Users can 
share high-level transformation objectives,

source repository access, and project context 
through natural language chat. AWS Transform's

specialized agents then classify application 
assets, create detailed documentation for better

understanding, decompose large monoliths 
into business domains, and apply built-in

mainframe expertise to develop a customized 
modernization plan for team review and approval.

AWS Transform refactors COBOL code into cloud 
optimized Java code while preserving business

logic. Accelerate large-scale modernization 
projects, improve transformation quality, and

enhance application performance, security, and 
scalability. Empower your team to collaborate,

scale to more projects, and drive greater 
innovation. Get started with AWS Transform today!
